trans-unit.source: Contains detailed information about input that was recognized by instances of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller detaljerad information om indata kändes instanser av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and provides detailed information about speech recognition, including the following: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Grammar%2A> property references the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> that the recognizer used to identify the speech.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen härleds från <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>och ger detaljerad information om taligenkänning, inklusive följande: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Grammar%2A>egenskapsreferenser i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>att tolken används för att identifiera talfunktionen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Grammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Text%2A> property contains the normalized text for the phrase.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Text%2A>-Egenskapen innehåller normaliserade texten för frasen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about text normalization, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om text normalisering finns <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property references the semantic information contained in the result.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>Refererar till semantisk information i resultatmängden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>

trans-unit.source: The semantic information is a dictionary of the key names and associated semantic data.
trans-unit.target: Semantisk information är en dictionary med nyckelnamn och associerade semantiska data.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property contains a collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the audio input.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>-Egenskapen innehåller en samling <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>objekt som representerar andra kandidat tolkningar av ljud indata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> for additional information.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>för ytterligare information.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A> property contains an ordered collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> objects that represent each recognized word in the input.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A>-Egenskapen innehåller en ordnad samling <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>objekt som representerar varje identifieras ord i indata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> contains display format, lexical format, and pronunciation information for the corresponding word.
trans-unit.target: Varje <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>innehåller visningsformatet, lexikala format och information om uttal för motsvarande ordet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>

trans-unit.source: Certain members of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> classes can generate a RecognitionResult.
trans-unit.target: Vissa medlemmar i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>klasser kan generera en RecognitionResult.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the following methods and events.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i följande metoder och händelser.

trans-unit.source: - Methods and events of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> class: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> - Methods and events of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> class.
trans-unit.target: - Methods and events of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> class: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> - Methods and events of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> class.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information about recognition events, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelser för igenkänning finns [med tal Recognition händelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of possible matches for input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar mängden möjliga matchningar för indata för taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: Recognition Alternates are ordered by the values of their <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Recognition ersättare sorteras efter värdena för sina <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: The confidence value of a given phrase indicates the probability that the phrase matches the input.
trans-unit.target: Förtroende-värdet för en viss fras anger sannolikheten att frasen matchar angivna indata.

trans-unit.source: The phrase with the highest confidence value is the phrase that most likely matches the input.
trans-unit.target: Frasen med det högsta värdet för förtroende är frasen som troligen matchar angivna indata.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> value should be evaluated individually and without reference to the confidence values of other Alternates.
trans-unit.target: Varje <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>värde bör utvärderas individuellt och utan referens till förtroende värdena för andra alternativ.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: The properties that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> inherits from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> provide detailed information about the phrase with the highest confidence score.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>ärver från <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>ger detaljerad information om frasen med högsta förtroende poängsättningen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: One use for the Alternates collection is for automated error correction.
trans-unit.target: En används ersättare samlingen för för automatisk felkorrigering.

trans-unit.source: For example, when designing a directory dialog, an application could prompt the user to check if the application has the correct information from a recognition event, as in, "Did you say 'Anna'?" If the user says "no", then the application could query the user about any alternates that had a high enough <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> score.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel när du skapar en dialogruta för katalogen bör kan ett program uppmana användaren att kontrollera om programmet har rätt information från recognition händelser, som i "du kan ändra"Anna"?" Om användaren säger "Nej" och sedan programmet kunde fråga användaren om alla alternativ som hade en tillräckligt hög <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>poäng.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about speech recognition and the use of recognition alternates, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om taligenkänning och användning av recognition ersättare [taligenkänning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) och [med tal Recognition händelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the recognition alternates.
trans-unit.target: En skrivskyddad samling recognition alternativ.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ljud som är associerade med igenkänning resultatet.

trans-unit.source: To get a section of the audio that is associated with a specific range of words in the recognition result, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att få en del av ljud som är associerad med ett specifikt intervall med orden i recognition resultatet kan använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The audio associated with the recognition result or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the recognizer generated the result from a call to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognize" name="EmulateRecognize" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeAsync" name="EmulateRecognizeAsync" href=""></xref> methods of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ljud som är associerade med igenkänning resultatet eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om tolken genereras resultatet från ett anrop till den <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognize" name="EmulateRecognize" href=""> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeAsync" name="EmulateRecognizeAsync" href=""> </xref> metoder för en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> instans.

trans-unit.source: Gets a section of the audio that is associated with a specific range of words in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en del av ljud som är associerad med ett specifikt intervall med orden i recognition resultatet.

trans-unit.source: To get the complete audio associated with the recognition result, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att få fullständig ljud som är associerade med igenkänning resultatet kan använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first word in the range.
trans-unit.target: Det första ordet i intervallet.

trans-unit.source: The last word in the range.
trans-unit.target: Det sista ordet i intervallet.

trans-unit.source: The section of audio associated with the word range.
trans-unit.target: Avsnittet ljud som är associerade med word-intervall.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer generated the result from a call to <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognize" name="EmulateRecognize" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeAsync" name="EmulateRecognizeAsync" href=""></xref> methods of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Tolken genereras resultatet från ett anrop till <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognize" name="EmulateRecognize" href=""> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeAsync" name="EmulateRecognizeAsync" href=""> </xref> metoder för den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller på en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instansen med de data som behövs för att serialisera målobjektet.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den här medlemmen är en implementering för medlem av explicit gränssnitt.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Det kan användas endast när den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>instans omvandlas till ett <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>gränssnitt.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: The object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som används för att fylla i med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: Mål för serialisering.
